title: Tropic zone
creator_credit: Lewis R. Foster, William Thomas, William H Pine and Paramount Pictures
brief_description: A man escaping from a political feud takes refuge in a banana port in Central America where he attempts to save a plantation from being taken over by crooks. Cast includes Ronald Reagan and Rhonda Fleming. Based on the novel “Gentlemen of the jungle” by Tom Gill.
